revision.description: The base schema for the Mixxx SQLITE database.
Add a header_parsed integer column to the library to indicate when a track's tags have been parsed.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN header_parsed integer DEFAULT 0;

revision.description: Change the location column to be a an integer. Change comment to be varchar(256) and album/artist/title to be varchar(64).
Add file type column.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN filetype varchar(8) DEFAULT "?";

revision.description: Add needs_verification column to library hashes table.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE LibraryHashes ADD COLUMN needs_verification INTEGER DEFAULT 0;

revision.description: Added a ReplayGain Column.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN replaygain float DEFAULT 0;

revision.description: Add timesplayed and rating column. Reset header state.
Added iTunes tables
Tables for Traktor library feature
revision.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS traktor_library ( id INTEGER primary key AUTOINCREMENT, artist varchar(48), title varchar(48), album varchar(48), year varchar(16), genre varchar(32), tracknumber varchar(3), location varchar(512) UNIQUE, comment varchar(60), duration integer, bitrate integer, bpm float, key varchar(6), rating integer ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS traktor_playlists ( id INTEGER primary key, name varchar(100) UNIQUE ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS traktor_playlist_tracks ( id INTEGER primary key AUTOINCREMENT, playlist_id INTEGER REFERENCES traktor_playlist(id), track_id INTEGER REFERENCES traktor_library(id) );

revision.description: Playlist and crate locks
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE crates ADD COLUMN locked integer DEFAULT 0; ALTER TABLE playlists ADD COLUMN locked integer DEFAULT 0;

revision.description: Tables for Rhythmbox library feature
revision.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rhythmbox_library ( id INTEGER primary key AUTOINCREMENT, artist varchar(48), title varchar(48), album varchar(48), year varchar(16), genre varchar(32), tracknumber varchar(3), location varchar(512) UNIQUE, comment varchar(60), duration integer, bitrate integer, bpm float, key varchar(6), rating integer ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rhythmbox_playlists ( id INTEGER primary key AUTOINCREMENT, name varchar(100) UNIQUE ); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rhythmbox_playlist_tracks ( id INTEGER primary key AUTOINCREMENT, playlist_id INTEGER REFERENCES rhythmbox_playlist(id), track_id INTEGER REFERENCES rhythmbox_library(id) );

revision.description: Add beats column to library table.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN beats BLOB; ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN beats_version TEXT;

revision.description: Add position column to Rhythmbox, iTunes, and Traktor playlist tables.
Add composer column to library table.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN composer varchar(64) DEFAULT "";

revision.description: Add datetime_added to playlists tracks.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE PlaylistTracks ADD COLUMN pl_datetime_added;

revision.description: Add track analysis table.
Add columns for BPM lock and a sub-version string for beats.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN bpm_lock INTEGER DEFAULT 0; ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN beats_sub_version TEXT DEFAULT '';

revision.description: Add keys column to library table.
Add key_id column to library table for caching the global key. Default to INVALID.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN key_id INTEGER DEFAULT 0;

revision.description: Crates in AutoDJ queue (for automated random-track selection).
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE crates ADD COLUMN autodj_source integer DEFAULT 0;

revision.description: Add grouping and album_artist column to library table.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN grouping TEXT DEFAULT ""; ALTER TABLE Library ADD COLUMN album_artist TEXT DEFAULT "";

revision.description: Add grouping and album_artist column to itunes_library table.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE itunes_library ADD COLUMN grouping TEXT DEFAULT ""; ALTER TABLE itunes_library ADD COLUMN album_artist TEXT DEFAULT "";

revision.description: Add directories table
Add cover art support. Default source is UNKNOWN and default type is NONE.
Add full replay gain support including peak amplitude. The default value for the peak amplitude is "undefined", represented by any negative value. The internal constant for "undefined" is -1.0.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN replaygain_peak REAL DEFAULT -1.0;

revision.description: Add new column "tracktotal" column that stores the total number of tracks as a string. The total number of tracks will be reloaded from the corresponding file upon first access when encountering the default value.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN tracktotal TEXT DEFAULT '//';

revision.description: Add cue color support. Default color is #FF0000.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE cues ADD COLUMN color INTEGER DEFAULT 4294901760 NOT NULL;

revision.description: Reset replay gain info for all FLAC files after fixing a decoding bug in version 2.1.0.
revision.sql: UPDATE library SET replaygain=0.0 WHERE filetype='flac' COLLATE NOCASE;

revision.description: This was used in the development of 2.3 to track whether cues were placed manually or automatically. However, this turned out to be unnecessary. This version is left as a placeholder so users who were using the master branch will have their database updated correctly for the subsequent schema change.
This was used in the development of 2.3 for permanent Rekordbox library feature tables, which have since been replaced by dynamic temporary tables, similar to the Serato library feature.
Add track color support.
revision.sql: ALTER TABLE library ADD COLUMN color INTEGER;

revision.description: Convert the PredefinedColor ID to the actual RGB value.
